title: launcher redownloading itself
body:
as you see in (https://prnt.sc/hjrkdg) when i jut open the launcher it scans files
now in (http://prntscr.com/hjrm87) it is downloading itself 
help me pls

replies.body: Ahhhh it looks like your client is just downloading the latest patch! In the first picture it's scanning the current files to know what needs updating, and in the second it's starting to grab the new files from the servers. Let that update finish and you'll be good to go!
http://prntscr.com/hjv1pb it is just downloading randomly i can't even know when it will ends
